channel.title: Robyn Dafoe on Brayden's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Robyn Dafoe on Brayden's Recipes

item.title: Cheese Bake
item.description: Ingredients 2 pounds ground beef 1/2 cup chopped onion 1 jar spaghetti sauce salt and pepper 1/4 teaspoon garlic salt 8 oz cream cheese 4 cups egg noodles 1 cup cottage cheese 1/4 cup sour cream 1/3 cup green onions 1/4 cup green pepper Parmesan cheese Mozzerella cheese Serve with garlic bread and salad. Directions Brown ground beef with onion and garlic. Stir with spaghetti sauce; turn to low.

item.title: Italian Sausage with Potatoes and Peppers
item.description: Ingredients 1 1/2 pounds Italian sausage 3 to 5 Russet potatoes 3 green peppers 1/4 cup water Salt and pepper to taste 1 onion Directions Preheat oven to 400Â°. Slice potatoes thin and layer on bottom of baking dish. Season potatoes. Thinly slice peppers and onions; layer over the potatoes before seasoning. Crumble uncooked sausage over the vegetables. Pour water into baking dish; cover dish with foil. Bake 1 1/2 hours.
